turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm trying to order a ice, sugar-free, vanilla latte from The Peet's in Town & Country on 77 Town & Country Road in Palo Alto, California.Â

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! I can help with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Give me a moment to set it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I apologize, did you say you'd like a Iced Latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, a Iced Sugar Free Vanilla Latte . And what size did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Medium with soy milk. Got it!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you. I think that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And this is for the location in Palo Alto, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! give me a moment while I send over your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.
